faqs.question: Can i get the delivery outside of Serviceable Areas?
faqs.answer: No. We only serve the areas mentioned in Serviceable Areas. Don't worry, we are expanding our network and soon serve your area.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: No. Currently there is no way to cancel your order.

faqs.question: Can I pay cash for my order on delivery?
faqs.answer: No. Currently there is no Cash on Delivery option.
